attributes.action: Remove the Conservative party from power as they are simply not viable.
attributes.additional_details: During the Covid 19 crisis the Conservative party has failed in every area of governing the country.  The government is actively refusing financial support to its people,  managing the spread of the virus in the most shambolic way in Europe,  allowing key advisers to the PM to break Covid controlling rules, with no comeback.    The list of failures is endless and the Government proves daily in one way or another that it is incapable of managing such a serious crisis.
attributes.background: The Conservative party to be removed from power, either by urgent election or by coalition of the remaining main parties in the U.K.
